endemic.endemicconfig.title: Endemic Options
endemic.endemicconfig.lightDescription.t: Saplings can require sky light to grow.
endemic.endemicconfig.lightLevel.tooltip: Saplings require this amount of light to grow properly.
Chance saplings will grow normally below the light level.
endemic.endemicconfig.lightStuntedChance: Chance saplings will grow stunted below the light level.
endemic.endemicconfig.lightDeadChance.to: Chance saplings will die below the light level.
endemic.endemicconfig.endemicDescription:
If a sapling is grown in its endemic biomes,
then it may grow into a endemic form.
endemic.endemicconfig.endemicChance.tool: Chance endemic saplings will grow into endemic forms in The Overworld.
endemic.endemicconfig.overworldDescripti:
If a sapling is grown outside its native biomes,
then it will grow into one of these forms.

First attempts to grow a normal tree, then a stunted tree, and then a dead tree.

If one of these values is not 100,
then sapling growth will be slowed down.
endemic.endemicconfig.overworldNormalCha: Chance nonnative saplings will grow normally in The Overworld.
endemic.endemicconfig.overworldStuntedCh: Chance nonnative saplings will grow stunted in The Overworld.
endemic.endemicconfig.overworldDeadChanc: Chance nonnative saplings will die in The Overworld.
If a sapling is grown in The Nether,
then it will grow into one of these forms.

First attempts to grow a normal tree, then a stunted tree, and then a dead tree.

If one of these values is not 100,
then sapling growth will be slowed down.
endemic.endemicconfig.netherNormalChance: Chance saplings will grow normally in The Nether.
endemic.endemicconfig.netherStuntedChanc: Chance saplings will grow stunted in The Nether.
endemic.endemicconfig.netherDeadChance.t: Chance saplings will die in The Nether.
endemic.endemicconfig.endDescription.too:
If a sapling is grown in The End,
then it will grow into one of these forms.

First attempts to grow a normal tree, then a stunted tree, and then a dead tree.

If one of these values is not 100,
then sapling growth will be slowed down.
endemic.endemicconfig.endNormalChance.to: Chance saplings will grow normally in The End.
endemic.endemicconfig.endStuntedChance.t: Chance saplings will grow stunted in The End.
endemic.endemicconfig.endDeadChance.tool: Chance saplings will die in The End.
